title: Tank Ekko is overpowered :D

embed.description: Tank Ekko is so much fun, its unbelievable on how much damage he can actually take in season 6 patch 6.10. Give him a go guys, i currently main ekko jungle, as i find he is the funnest champion for me to play :D!

body:
Hey guys, made a little Funtage :D, Hope you guys enjoy!!

Any bit of feedback is appreciated :)!

replies.body: Tank anything can be both good and bad, all you need to do is counter build the enemy.
Yeah that's very true, but i believe ekko's base damage is quite high, or maybe riot nerfed it? not too sure, but ekko is super fun :)
It's also just the stupid client and old coding that makes all that possible. I just watched the video and that EZ ult, that is BS.
